basics.name: Iverson Yago
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

highlights: Provided tech support for Student Housing residents
Troubleshooting and solving  connection issues for residents
Assisting Housing staff with a variety of networking projects

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: University of Hawaii at Manoa Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.5 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
